description: Try our easy to follow Baked Cabbage With Creamy Mustard Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Discovery Garden,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Baked Cabbage With Creamy Mustard Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small green cabbage, cut into 8 wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 250Â°C. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.
Place cabbage, in a single layer, on trays. Drizzle with 2 tbs oil and season. Bake for 20 minutes or until slightly charred and tender.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add mustards, poppy seeds and cream. Bring to the boil. Stir in lemon juice.
Scatter chives over cabbage and serve with sauce.
